testcase.classname: To validate the search of hotels in Adactin page
testcase.name: To verify the user can login to adactin
testcase.system-out: Given user has to open url of the adactin page..............................passed When user has to give username and password.................................passed And click the login button..................................................passed Then verify the user can view the next page od adactin......................passed

testcase.classname: To validate the search of hotels in Adactin page
testcase.name: To search the hotels availability as per user requirement
testcase.system-out: Given To search hotels as per user requirement..............................passed When user is in search page of hotel give all details like Location Hotels RoomType NoOfRooms CheckInDate CheckOutDate AdultsPerRoom ChildrenPerRoom.passed Then click search...........................................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate the search of hotels in Adactin page
testcase.name: To select the searched hotel
testcase.system-out: Given To select the searched hotel as per user's search.....................passed Then click continue.........................................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate the search of hotels in Adactin page
testcase.name: To get the order number after booking hotel
testcase.system-out: Given To book the hotel and get the order number............................passed When user has to fill the details for booking "Renuka", "Devi", "Chennai", "1234 5678 9874 5879", "VISA", "February", "2015" "332".passed Then Click Book now.........................................................passed
